title: Noddy be brave (K)
creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. Noddy is looking forward to visiting Big Ears on his day off, but a car accident means he must find alternative transport for his taxi service. While Noddy’s car is in the shop, Mr Honk from Car Town starts up his own taxi service in Toy Town. Noddy and Big Ears must devise a plan! Narrated by Richard Briers.
creator_credit_for_label: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
